highlights.title: Designed real-time fraud detection pipeline
highlights.content: Architected and led implementation of a real-time fraud detection system processing millions of transactions per second. Reduced false positive rate by 40% while maintaining sub-50ms latency SLA. Collaborated with data science team to integrate ML models into the streaming pipeline.

highlights.title: Migrated payment orchestration to event-driven architecture
highlights.content: Led a team of 6 engineers to migrate the legacy payment orchestration layer from synchronous REST calls to an event-driven architecture using Kafka. Eliminated cascading failures and improved system resilience during peak traffic.

highlights.title: Mentored 4 engineers to senior level
highlights.content: Established a structured mentorship program within the payments infrastructure team. All four mentees were promoted to senior engineer within 18 months. Created technical growth rubrics and regular 1:1 frameworks.

highlights.title: Built Instagram Reels recommendation engine
highlights.content: Core contributor to the Reels recommendation engine serving 2B+ daily active users. Designed the candidate retrieval layer using approximate nearest neighbor search, improving content relevance scores by 18%. System handled 500K QPS at peak.

highlights.title: Reduced React Native app bundle size by 35%
highlights.content: Led a cross-functional initiative to audit and optimize the Instagram app's React Native bundle. Implemented code splitting, tree shaking, and lazy loading strategies. Resulted in 12% improvement in app cold-start time on mid-tier Android devices.

highlights.title: Shipped privacy-first data deletion pipeline
highlights.content: Designed and implemented an end-to-end user data deletion pipeline to comply with GDPR and CCPA regulations. The system processed deletion requests across 40+ data stores within the mandated 30-day window. Passed external audit with zero findings.

highlights.title: On-call lead for Instagram infrastructure
highlights.content: Served as primary on-call lead for Instagram's backend infrastructure, managing incident response for a platform serving 2B+ monthly active users. Reduced MTTR from 45 minutes to 15 minutes by implementing automated runbooks and improving alerting.

highlights.title: Built dynamic pricing engine for Experiences
highlights.content: Designed and shipped a dynamic pricing engine for Airbnb Experiences that adjusted pricing based on demand, seasonality, and host performance. Increased booking conversion by 22% and host revenue by 15% across 50K+ listings.

highlights.title: Migrated search service to Elasticsearch
highlights.content: Led migration of Airbnb's legacy search infrastructure from Solr to Elasticsearch. Improved search latency by 60% and enabled new features like typo-tolerant search and geo-spatial filtering. Zero-downtime migration over 3 months.

highlights.title: Implemented A/B testing framework for Experiences
highlights.content: Built an internal A/B testing framework used by 20+ product teams to run experiments on the Experiences platform. Integrated with the analytics pipeline to provide real-time statistical significance calculations.

highlights.title: Redesigned Spotify Web Player
highlights.content: Core engineer on the Spotify Web Player redesign, migrating from a legacy Backbone.js application to React. Implemented the playback controls, playlist views, and search interface. The new player achieved a 25% increase in session duration.

highlights.title: Built real-time collaborative playlist feature
highlights.content: Implemented real-time collaborative playlists using WebSockets, allowing multiple users to add, remove, and reorder tracks simultaneously with conflict resolution. Feature was used by 10M+ users within first month of launch.

highlights.title: Optimized frontend performance for emerging markets
highlights.content: Led performance optimization initiative targeting low-bandwidth markets in Southeast Asia and Africa. Implemented progressive loading, service workers for offline playback queue, and reduced initial payload by 50%. Contributed to 30% user growth in target markets.

highlights.title: Cloud migration strategy for Fortune 500 bank
highlights.content: Led the technology workstream for a $12M cloud migration program at a top-10 US bank. Assessed 200+ applications for cloud readiness, designed the migration roadmap, and built the business case. The program was approved by the board and completed migration of 80 applications in Year 1.

highlights.title: Built internal resource allocation dashboard
highlights.content: Developed a web-based dashboard for tracking consultant utilization and project staffing across the Technology Consulting practice. Replaced manual Excel-based tracking, saving partners 10+ hours per week on staffing decisions.

highlights.title: SAP implementation for retail client
highlights.content: Served as technical consultant on a SAP ERP implementation for a major US retailer with 500+ stores. Configured the inventory management and supply chain modules, conducted user acceptance testing, and trained 50+ end users.

highlights.title: M.S. Computer Science — Stanford University
highlights.content: Master of Science in Computer Science with specialization in Systems and Machine Learning. Thesis on distributed consensus algorithms for geo-replicated databases.

highlights.title: B.S. Computer Science — UC Berkeley
highlights.content: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, graduated with honors. Dean's list all semesters. Teaching assistant for CS 61B (Data Structures) and CS 162 (Operating Systems).
